sentences.sentence: He has been an active participant in the discussion.
sentences.translation: 他一直积极参与这次讨论。

sentences.sentence: As an active participant in various volunteer work, I have a lot of experience in serving others.
sentences.translation: 作为一个积极参与各种志愿活动的人，我在服务他人方面有很多经验。

sentences.sentence: In the past few years, Math Counts added two new middle school programs to try to diversify its participant pool.
sentences.translation: 在过去的几年里，Math Counts 增加了两个新的中学项目，试图使其参与者多样化。
